Text:
THanks TV.
Hey will you get THE FAB FIVE (30 for 30 Espn doc)??
That would be awesome.

For anyone wondering this is the 2hours 4min version of the movie. Downloaded and watched myself. 

V-9 very small issues.
A-10 no issue at all
M-8 the first 1:30 of the movie is a 10 but the ending lets it down.

so whats this a screener? DVD release date : 23 May 2011. Having been a teenager in Glasgow at the same time as the film is set i can recognise everything in it right down to the Crombie coats and Harrington jackets. We used to sing "bovver boots and bovver braces, we're the boys that slash yer faces" Tollboys Ya Bass!....  Peter Mullen socialises in a pub quite near me and is a really down tae earth bloke Try to see his movie "Orphans" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0119842/
